# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# Generated by yt-dlp

# Instagram Cookies for Railway Deployment
# 
# IMPORTANT: This file needs actual Instagram cookies for Railway deployment
# 
# How to get Instagram cookies:
# 1. Login to Instagram in your browser
# 2. Open Developer Tools (F12) 
# 3. Go to Application/Storage > Cookies > https://instagram.com
# 4. Copy sessionid, csrftoken, ds_user_id values
# 5. Replace the template below with your actual values
#
# Format: domain	flag	path	secure	expiration	name	value
#
# Example (replace with your actual cookie values):
# .instagram.com	TRUE	/	TRUE	1735689600	sessionid	your_session_id_here
# .instagram.com	TRUE	/	TRUE	1735689600	csrftoken	your_csrf_token_here  
# .instagram.com	TRUE	/	TRUE	1735689600	ds_user_id	your_user_id_here
#
# NOTE: Without valid cookies, Instagram videos may fail to download on Railway
# The app will show helpful alternatives: video upload or Facebook Ad URLs
